page.title: 18ARTS & CRAFTS.W.I.
page.content: 63 members with Miss Stemp as President & 11 committee members meet monthly in the school hall.We belong to Waterombe Group:4W.I.'s which meets twice a year.We send delegates to 2 council meetings of Dorset Federation WI a year & to Royal Albert Hall AGM in alternate years.In 1985 members played in county skittles,scrabble & whist tournaments;entered a craft comp. at the Dorchester Show;ran sideshows & entered a float at village carnival;made a survey of the locality for Doomsday Project.Demonstrations & talks have included microwave cookery & local archaeology,the work of lifeboat men & lacemaking.Also a display of 150 years of fashion & our own flower,vegetable,craft & cookery show at which cups were awarded. Joining a lively WI is one of the best ways for newomers to make friends.
